title: Looking for Shaco Mentor
body: I am currently Silver 1, I have a huge passion for the Champion Shaco, But feel like i could get a lot better with some form of coaching, if there is anyone out there plat+ that is a Shaco Main or was a Shaco Main I would appreciate your help :) Thanks :)

replies.body: Try Shaclone on youtube watch him and you will be good! don't go full damage go a little tanky because he falls off heaps late game.
Wait what. How do you drop to silver 1 from Plat in half a season!
It's probably a bought account, especially considering they have to ASK for a mentor.
Even if it's bought, it's been half a season. He dropped 2 tiers! Cri.
The bought account is strong in this one.
